Tbl_Ben10.name: Ben Tennyson
Tbl_Ben10.description: A young boy who can transform into ten different alien superheroes.

Tbl_Ben10.name: Four Arms
Tbl_Ben10.description: A strong and powerful alien with four arms.

Tbl_Ben10.name: Heatblast
Tbl_Ben10.description: A fiery alien who can control fire.

Tbl_Ben10.name: Diamondhead
Tbl_Ben10.description: A crystalline alien with diamond-hard skin.

Tbl_Ben10.name: XLR8
Tbl_Ben10.description: A fast and agile alien with super speed.

Tbl_Ben10.name: Grey Matter
Tbl_Ben10.description: A tiny but intelligent alien with a big brain.

Tbl_Ben10.name: Wildmutt
Tbl_Ben10.description: A feral alien with enhanced senses and claws.

Tbl_Ben10.name: Stinkfly
Tbl_Ben10.description: A flying alien who can shoot sticky goo.

Tbl_Ben10.name: Ripjaws
Tbl_Ben10.description: An aquatic alien with sharp teeth and gills.

Tbl_Ben10.name: Ghostfreak
Tbl_Ben10.description: An intangible alien who can phase through objects.
